title: Microsoft Prepares for Another Overhaul of Outlook Focused on Artificial Intelligence

scene_plan.description: A wide shot of Microsoft's headquarters with the new leadership team in focus.
Cut to a focused interview setup where @lee627 is seated across from CEO Satya Nadella and CTO Alex Gaonkar discussing the Outlook revamp.
A shot of hands pointing towards a graphic showing AI integration into email workflows with voice-over by @lee627 explaining its significance and potential impact on productivity.
A shot of the Outlook app interface highlighting AI features like predictive typing and personalized email sorting with voice-over by @lee627 detailing how these work.
A shot of a calendar view showing scheduled meetings being organized automatically as the narration continues about AI's role in enhancing Outlookâ€™s functionality by @lee627.
A shot of a user interacting with an email notification that has been prioritized and sorted using AI algorithms as explained in the voice-over by @lee627.
A shot of a user setting up an automated email response with personalized greetings and content selection based on AI analysis as described in the voice-over by @lee627.
A shot of a user's email folder neatly organized with categories and subcategories created through AI assistance as explained in the voice-over by @lee627.
A shot of a user's calendar view showing upcoming events automatically organized and prioritized with AI assistance as explained in the voice-over by @lee627.
A shot of a user's Outlook interface highlighting new features and improvements made possible through AI integration as explained in the voice-over by @lee627.

sora_prompt.voice_over: @lee627, calmly narrates: 'Microsoft is rebuilding Outlook with a focus on artificial intelligence. This initiative comes under new leadership at Microsoft.'

ending.description: A shot of the newsroom set up as @lee627 concludes and invites viewers to comment below.
